title: Learning Technology Integration for Pre-Service Teachers: A Blended Learning-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational educational theories and basic digital tool utilization skills
context.additional_context: Blended learning model applying the TPACK framework and ISTE standards to help pre-service teachers effectively integrate technology in real classroom settings

learning_goals: Learners can select and design implementation plans for at least three digital tools suitable for social studies curricula.
Learners can complete a technology-integrated lesson design plan by applying the TPACK framework.
Learners can develop an assessment rubric based on ISTE standards and revise it through peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
